Directions: Place peach halves in an ungreased shallow 2-qt. baking dish; set aside. In a saucepan, combine the brown sugar, butter and curry powder. Cook and stir over low heat until sugar is dissolved. Pour over peaches. Sprinkle with almonds. Bake, uncovered, at 375 degrees F for 20 minutes or until heated through. Combine sour cream and cinnamon; serve with peaches.
